question: Punjab National Bank and BSNL has joined hands to roll out open mobile wallet Speedpay for how many states?
explanation: Punjab National Bank and BSNL has joined hands to roll out open mobile wallet Speedpay across 10 states in the country. PNBs Speedway wallet will operate like any other mobile wallet for paying bills, recharging phone. Its users will be able to deposit and withdraw money from authorized retail outlets. Speedway users will be able to operate Internet banking services from the application.
